discussion.p: basic_string_view has size(), empty(), and data() members, but including <string_view> isn't guaranteed to give you access to the corresponding free function templates. This seems surprising.
discussion.note: 2017-11-01 Moved to Tentatively Ready after 7 positive votes for P0 on c++std-lib.

resolution.p: This resolution is relative to N4687.

blockquote.p: -1- In addition to being available via inclusion of the <iterator> header, the function templates in 27.8 are available when any of the following headers are included: <array>, <deque>, <forward_list>, <list>, <map>, <regex>, <set>, <string>, <string_view>, <unordered_map>, <unordered_set>, and <vector>.
